meanings.sent1: The color of my eyes is inheritable from my parents.
meanings.sent2: In our family, curly hair is an inheritable trait.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how my love for ice cream seems to be inheritable.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter is an inheritable joy that brightens up any room.
meanings.sent5: The talent for playing the piano is an inheritable gift that runs in our family.

meanings.definition: Able to be passed down from one generation to the next.
meanings.sent1: The antique clock is an inheritable family heirloom.
meanings.sent2: Traditions are inheritable customs that connect us to our past.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing how my clumsiness seems to be inheritable from my dad.
meanings.sent4: The love for storytelling is an inheritable treasure that enriches our family history.
meanings.sent5: The wisdom of our elders is an inheritable legacy that guides us through life.
